Title: Mickey's Once Upon a Christmas
Director: Jun Falkenstein, Alex Mann, Bradley Raymond, Toby Shelton, Bill Speers
Writer: Charlie Cohen (screenplay), Scott Spencer Gorden (screenplay), Tom Nance (screenplay), Carter Crocker (screenplay), Richard Cray (screenplay), Temple Mathews (screenplay), Thomas Hart (interstitial narration), Eddie Guzelian (interstitial narration), Karl Geurs (screenplay), Kevin Hopps (screenplay), Robin Kingsland (screenplay by: segment "Mickey & Minnie's Gift of the Magi"), Robin Kingsland, Bill Motz (screenplay), Brian Pimental (screenplay), Randy Rogel (screenplay), Tom Rogers (screenplay), Bob Roth (screenplay), Dave Thomas (screenplay), George Tarry (screenplay), Alex Mann (screenplay), Alex Mann, Ross Hastings (screenplay)
Actors: Kelsey Grammer, Wayne Allwine, Russi Taylor, Tony Anselmo
Plot: A Christmas themed, three-part anthology-style video. The first part, "Donald Duck: Stuck on Christmas", is essentially a retelling of Groundhog Day (1993), with Huey, Dewey, and Louie ...
